categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: Baron Deathmark was a male Kadas'sa'Nikto announcer for the Huttball games played by the Hutt Cartel between 3643 BBY and 3630 BBY. At some point, he commentated on a match between the Frog-dogs and the Rotworms.
Baron Deathmark was voiced by Steven Jay Blum for the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
